message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11,000. This is a great deal, considering the value you place on it is $12,000. Let me know if you're interested!
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I'm looking to pay closer to my initial value of $12,000.  I'm willing to offer $10,500 for the product.  Let's see if we can find a middle ground.

I understand you're looking to pay closer to your initial value of $12,000, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $11,500. This is a fair price, considering the value you place on the product. Let's see if we can seal the deal!
